infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedroom. You can barely contain your excitement.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a wardrobe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The wardrobe contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The wardrobe is empty![end if] [if c_1 is locked]A locked[else if c_1 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] chest of drawers is close by.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The chest of drawers contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can make out a bed. The bed is large.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bed you make out [a list of things on the s_0]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] You make out a desk chair. The desk chair is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the desk chair you see [a list of things on the s_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if] You make out a dark carpet. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! [if there is something on the s_2]On the dark carpet you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a nightstand. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a nightstand, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the nightstand, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]However, the nightstand, like an empty nightstand, has nothing on it.[end if] You can make out a dressing table. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the dressing table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] Look over there! a desk. The desk is normal.[if there is something on the s_5] On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the desk, like an empty desk, has nothing on it. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a desk in a room.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is not blocked by one.

infos.name: corridor
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a corridor.

 You can make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] shoe cabinet.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The shoe cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_2], so there's that.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The shoe cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You scan the room for a hat rack, and you find a hat rack. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the hat rack. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]However, the hat rack, like an empty hat rack, has nothing on it.[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto an umbrella stand. [if there is something on the s_7]On the umbrella stand you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty.[end if] You can make out a key holder. [if there is something on the s_8]On the key holder you can make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] You see a coat hanger. [if there is something on the s_9]On the coat hanger you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, there is no door.

infos.name: wardrobe
infos.desc: The [noun] looks ominous. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if locked]There is a lock on it and seems impossible to break open.[otherwise]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[end if]

infos.name: chest of drawers
infos.desc: The [noun] looks towering. [if open]It is open.[else if locked]It is locked.[otherwise]It is closed.[end if]

infos.name: shoe cabinet
infos.desc: The [noun] looks grand. [if open]It is open.[else if locked]It is locked.[otherwise]It is closed.[end if]

infos.name: key holder
infos.desc: The [noun] is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.name: blue moccasins
infos.desc: The [noun] would seem to be out of place here

infos.name: clean plaid pullover
infos.desc: The [noun] would seem to be to fit in here

metadata.goal: Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! You find yourself in a messy house. Many things are not in their usual location. Let's clean up this place. After you'll have done, this little house is going to be spick and span! Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.
